tags.name: cds-alert-actions
tags.description:
Web component alert actions to be used inside default and banner alerts.

```typescript
import '@clr/core/alert/register.js';
```

```html
<cds-alert>
   Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet
   <cds-alert-actions>
     <cds-button>Fix</cds-button>
   </cds-alert-actions>
</cds-alert>
```

tags.name: cds-alert-group
tags.description:
Alert groups are containers for a set of alerts. Alert groups can hold one or many alerts
inside of them with the expectation that all alerts will be of the same type. The exception
to this rule is the `loading` alert type, which will be displayed regardless of the type
of alert group containing it.

```typescript
import '@clr/core/alert/register.js';
```

```html
   <cds-alert-group type="danger">
     <cds-alert closable="true">
       Single alert
       <cds-alert-actions>
         buttons, links
       </cds-alert-actions>
     </cds-alert>
     <cds-alert type="loading">
       Single Alert
     </cds-alert>
     <cds-alert closable="true">
       Another alert
       <cds-alert-actions>
         buttons, links
       </cds-alert-actions>
     </cds-alert>
   </cds-alert-group>
```

properties.name: status
properties.type: default | info | success | warning | danger | unknown | loading

tags.name: cds-alert
tags.description:
Alerts are banners that communicate a message with a severity attached to it.
They grab the user’s attention to provide critical information needed in context.

Alerts outside of a cds-alert-group or cds-app-alert-group component will be
displayed as a "lightweight alert". Lightweight alerts, by default, provide no
close button component and they inherit no status (a.k.a. success, danger, etc.).

Alerts inside a cds-alert-group component inherit their status from the containing
alert group.

Alerts inside a cds-app-alert-group component inherit their status as a default from
the containing app-alert group, although it can be overridden on individual alerts.

```typescript
import '@clr/core/alert/register.js';
```

```html
   <cds-alert>
     Single Alert
     <cds-alert-actions>
       buttons, links
     </cds-alert-actions>
   </cds-alert>
```

properties.name: closable
properties.description:
If false, the alert will not render the close button.

Lightweight alerts do not display close buttons

properties.name: status
properties.type: default | info | success | warning | danger | unknown | loading

events.name: closeChange
events.description: notify when the user has clicked the dismiss button

slots.name: default
slots.description: Content slot for inside the alert

tags.name: cds-badge
tags.description:
Badges provide a method to highlight a count of an element either next to it
or inside the element itself.

```typescript
import '@clr/core/badge/register.js';
```

```html
<cds-badge status="info">2</cds-badge>
```

properties.name: color
properties.description: Sets the color of the badge

slots.name: default
slots.description: Content slot for inside the badge

tags.description:

properties.name: color
properties.description: Sets the color of the badge

tags.name: cds-button
tags.description:
Buttons allow an application to communicate action and direct user intent.

```typescript
import '@clr/core/button/register.js';
```

```html
<cds-button>submit</cds-button>
```

properties.name: action
properties.description:
Define the type of action the button triggers

- `solid`: buttons direct the user’s attention to the primary action the application is suggesting that the user take.
- `outline`: buttons indicate secondary actions that compliments a primary action or reduces visual noise when there are many actions on the page.
- `flat`: buttons are used as tertiary buttons. Can also be used inline because they are different from content in style and recognizable as buttons alongside content.

properties.name: status
properties.description: Sets the color of the button to match the following string statuses

properties.name: size
properties.description: Sets the overall height and width of the button based on the following string values:

properties.name: block
properties.description: Sets if the button should be full width with display block

slots.name: default
slots.description: Content slot for inside the button

tags.name: cds-icon-button
tags.description:
Icon buttons give applications a compact alternative to communicate action and direct user intent.

```typescript
import '@clr/core/button/register.js';
```

```html
<cds-icon-button><cds-icon shape="download"></cds-icon></cds-icon-button>
```

properties.name: ariaLabel
properties.description:
The aria-label attribute is required for accessibility. The cds-icon-button
will warn if used without the aria-label being set.

Ideally, the aria-label will be specific to the button's purpose. Avoid sharing
generic labels across multiple icon buttons on a page.

properties.name: action
properties.description:
Define the type of action the button triggers

- `solid`: buttons direct the user’s attention to the primary action the application is suggesting that the user take.
- `outline`: buttons indicate secondary actions that compliments a primary action or reduces visual noise when there are many actions on the page.
- `flat`: buttons are used as tertiary buttons. Can also be used inline because they are different from content in style and recognizable as buttons alongside content.

properties.name: status
properties.description: Sets the color of the button to match the following string statuses

properties.name: size
properties.description: Sets the overall height and width of the button based on the following string values:

properties.name: block
properties.description: Sets if the button should be full width with display block

slots.name: default
slots.description: Content slot for inside the button

tags.name: cds-inline-button
tags.description:
Inline buttons are used inside and alongside textual content within Clarity components.
They give action buttons a less prominent, yet familiar, visual presence.

```typescript
import '@clr/core/button/register.js';
```

```html
<cds-inline-button>Button text goes here</cds-inline-button>
```

slots.name: default
slots.description: Content slot for inside the button

tags.name: cds-checkbox-group
tags.description:
Checkbox Group

```typescript
import '@clr/core/checkbox';
```

```html
<cds-checkbox-group>
   <label>Select an item</label>
   <cds-checkbox>
     <label>Test</label>
     <input type="checkbox" />
   </cds-checkbox>

   <cds-checkbox>
     <label>Test</label>
     <input type="checkbox" />
   </cds-checkbox>
</cds-checkbox-group>
```

properties.name: controlAlign
properties.description: Align the labels of controls within group left or right

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Disable all controls within a control group or omit and disable controls individually

properties.name: responsive
properties.description:
By default forms will collapse to layout that prevents overflow.
If disabled control layout may break or overflow in unexpected ways.

tags.name: cds-checkbox
tags.description:
Checkbox

```typescript
import '@clr/core/checkbox/register.js';
```

```html
<cds-checkbox>
   <label>checkbox</label>
   <input type="checkbox" />
   <cds-control-message>message text</cds-control-message>
</cds-checkbox>
```

properties.name: controlAlign
properties.description: Align the labels of controls within group left or right

properties.name: validate
properties.description:
Set the validate attribute to sync with HTML5 native validation
https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Learn/Forms/Form_validation

properties.name: responsive
properties.description:
By default forms will collapse to layout that prevents overflow.
If disabled control layout may break or overflow in unexpected ways.

tags.name: cds-datalist
tags.description:
Datalist

```typescript
import '@clr/core/datalist/register.js';
```

```html
<cds-datalist>
   <label>datalist</label>
   <input type="text" />
   <datalist>
     <option value="item 1"></option>
     <option value="item 2"></option>
     <option value="item 3"></option>
   </datalist>
   <cds-control-message>message text</cds-control-message>
</cds-datalist>
```

properties.name: validate
properties.description:
Set the validate attribute to sync with HTML5 native validation
https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Learn/Forms/Form_validation

properties.name: responsive
properties.description:
By default forms will collapse to layout that prevents overflow.
If disabled control layout may break or overflow in unexpected ways.

slots.name: default
slots.description: For projecting input, datalist and label

tags.name: cds-icon

properties.name: shape
properties.description:
Changes the svg glyph displayed in the icon component. Defaults to the 'unknown' icon if
the specified icon cannot be found in the icon registry.

properties.name: size
properties.type: string | sm | md | lg | xl | xxl

properties.name: title
properties.description: If present, customizes the aria-label for the icon for accessibility.

properties.name: dir
properties.deprecatedMessage:
Takes a directional value (up|down|left|right) that rotates the icon 90° with the
top of the icon pointing in the specified direction.

Deprecated in 3.0. Use `direction` instead. `dir` will be removed in 4.0!

properties.name: solid
properties.description: Displays most icons in their "filled" version if set to `true`.

properties.name: inverse
properties.description:
Inverts color of icon fills and outlines if `true`.
Useful for displaying icons on a dark background.

properties.name: badge
properties.type: info | success | warning | danger | inherit | warning  -triangle | inherit-triangle

tags.name: cds-icon

properties.name: shape
properties.description:
Changes the svg glyph displayed in the icon component. Defaults to the 'unknown' icon if
the specified icon cannot be found in the icon registry.

properties.name: size
properties.type: string | sm | md | lg | xl | xxl

properties.name: title
properties.description: If present, customizes the aria-label for the icon for accessibility.

properties.name: dir
properties.deprecatedMessage:
Takes a directional value (up|down|left|right) that rotates the icon 90° with the
top of the icon pointing in the specified direction.

Deprecated in 3.0. Use `direction` instead. `dir` will be removed in 4.0!

properties.name: solid
properties.description: Displays most icons in their "filled" version if set to `true`.

properties.name: inverse
properties.description:
Inverts color of icon fills and outlines if `true`.
Useful for displaying icons on a dark background.

properties.name: badge
properties.type: info | success | warning | danger | inherit | warning  -triangle | inherit-triangle

tags.name: cds-input-group
tags.description:
Input Group

```typescript
import '@clr/core/input/register.js';
```

```html
<cds-input-group>
   <label>Host URL</label>
   <cds-select cds-layout="align:shrink">
     <label>URL Protocol</label>
     <select>
       <option>https://</option>
       <option>http://</option>
     </select>
   </cds-select>
   <cds-input>
     <label>Host URL</label>
     <input placeholder="example.com" type="url" />
   </cds-input>
   <cds-control-message>Host ID: 123456</cds-control-message>
</cds-input-group>
```

properties.description: Align the labels of controls within group left or right

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Disable all controls within a control group or omit and disable controls individually

properties.name: responsive
properties.description:
By default forms will collapse to layout that prevents overflow.
If disabled control layout may break or overflow in unexpected ways.

properties.name: hidden
properties.description:
Its recommended to remove or add a focus trap element from the DOM
some SSR systems can have technical constraints where the item can
only be removed via CSS/hidden.

events.name: closeChange
events.description: notify when the user has clicked the close button

tags.name: cds-tag
tags.description:
Tags show concise metadata in a compact format.
Tags are visually styled to differentiate them from buttons.

```typescript
import '@clr/core/tag/register.js';
```

```html
<cds-tag status="info">Info</cds-tag>
```

properties.name: status
properties.description:
Sets the color of the tag (and badge if present) from the following predefined list of statuses:
'info', 'success', 'warning', 'danger'

properties.name: color
properties.description: Sets the color of the tag (and badge if present) from a predefined list of choices

properties.name: closable
properties.description:
If present, shows a close icon to one side of the tag.
Note that applications must wire up the action to remove the tag on click and also
that you cannot have a clickable AND closable tag. The closable attribute-property
shows the close icon. What happens when the tag is clicked is for application developers
to decide.
If closable is present, the tag will be considered "clickable".

slots.name: default
slots.description: Content slot for inside the tag

tags.name: cds-tag

properties.name: color
properties.description: Sets the color of the tag (and badge if present) from a predefined list of choices

properties.name: closable
properties.description:
If present, shows a close icon to one side of the tag.
Note that applications must wire up the action to remove the tag on click and also
that you cannot have a clickable AND closable tag. The closable attribute-property
shows the close icon. What happens when the tag is clicked is for application developers
to decide.
If closable is present, the tag will be considered "clickable".

slots.name: default
slots.description: Content slot for inside the tag
